name: BiomeCentric - Microbiome-Centric Contract Manufacturing
description: BiomeCentric (Australia) offers end-to-end contract manufacturing specializing in microbiome-centric health and beauty formulations. Their expertise in formulations designed to nurture the microbiome enables brands to create next-generation products that support beneficial bacteria and skin ecosystem health.
notes: Specialized microbiome-centric focus differentiates from general contract manufacturers. End-to-end services cover formulation through production. Australian location provides quality manufacturing with regulatory expertise. Ideal for brands wanting microbiome-focused turnkey solutions.
